data.comment: The first-half is under way at Mapei Stadium - Torino kick-off to start the match.
Marco Guida awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 2, Sassuolo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
Sassuolo surge into the attack at Mapei Stadium but Gian Marco Ferrari’s header is off-target.
In the minute 5, Torino have a goal kick.
Can Sassuolo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
Simone Verdi for Torino drives towards goal at Mapei Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 10, Throw-in Torino.
Goal kick for Sassuolo at Mapei Stadium.
Ball safe as Sassuolo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 12, Free kick Sassuolo.
In Reggio Emilia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Torino needs to be cautious. Sassuolo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 14, Free kick in a good position for Sassuolo!
Kaan Ayhan (Sassuolo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Sassuolo in the half of Torino.
Free kick for Torino in the half of Sassuolo.
Simone Verdi (Torino) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 18, Torino pushes forward through Soualiho Meite, whose finish on goal is saved.
Torino have been awarded a corner by Marco Guida.
Marco Guida signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 21, Marco Guida awards Torino a goal kick.
Throw-in for Torino in their own half.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 23, Torino have been awarded a corner by Marco Guida.
Throw-in high up the field for Torino in Reggio Emilia.
Throw-in for Torino at Mapei Stadium.
In the minute 27, Domenico Berardi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sassuolo.
Sassuolo's Vlad Chiriches breaks free at Mapei Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Torino goal kick.
In the minute 27, Mergim Vojvoda (Torino) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Sassuolo close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Torino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Torino at Mapei Stadium.
Important block from the Sassuolo defence as Mergim Vojvoda fires in a strike for Torino.
Torino have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 33, Karol Linetty is on target to give Torino a 0-1 advantage.
Mergim Vojvoda instrumental with a fine assist.
Torino drives forward and Simone Verdi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 36, It's a goal kick for the away team in Reggio Emilia.
Torino drive upfield and Karol Linetty gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sassuolo defender.
Corner awarded to Torino.
In the minute 39, Marco Guida signals a throw-in for Torino, close to Sassuolo's area.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
In Reggio Emilia Sassuolo drive forward through Giorgos Kyriakopoulos. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 41, In Reggio Emilia, Andrea Belotti of Torino is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Torino have been awarded a corner by Marco Guida.
Can Torino capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sassuolo's half?
In the minute 42, Marco Guida awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Torino at Mapei Stadium.
Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 45, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Sassuolo close to the penalty box.
Sassuolo push forward at Mapei Stadium and Manuel Locatelli gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Torino defence.
The first-half is over at Mapei Stadium.
In the minute 46, The ref has blown to start the second-half. Sassuolo kick-off.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
Torino needs to be cautious. Sassuolo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 48, It's a goal kick for the away team in Reggio Emilia.
Throw-in for Torino in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 51, Marco Guida signals a free kick to Sassuolo.
Vlad Chiriches for Sassuolo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Marco Guida.
In the minute 52, Sassuolo's Giorgos Kyriakopoulos gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Torino defender.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, In Reggio Emilia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Torino.
Sassuolo's Domenico Berardi is whistled for offside at Mapei Stadium.
In the minute 55, Torino's Andrea Belotti goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Marco Guida awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
Torino's Simone Verdi gets in a shot on goal at Mapei Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 57, Torino have been awarded a corner by Marco Guida.
In Reggio Emilia, Andrea Belotti (Torino) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Corner awarded to Torino.
In the minute 58, In Reggio Emilia, Bremer (Torino) misses the target with a header.
Sassuolo have a goal kick.
Marco Guida signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
In the minute 59, Gian Marco Ferrari (Sassuolo) has received a first yellow card.
Torino's Andrea Belotti is on target but unsuccessful.
Sassuolo push forward at Mapei Stadium and Filip Djuricic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Torino defence.
In the minute 61, Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Marco Guida.
Kaan Ayhan (Sassuolo) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Torino goal kick.
In the minute 61, Mert Muldur is replacing Kaan Ayhan for the home team.
Roberto De Zerbi is making the team's second substitution at Mapei Stadium with Mehdi Bourabia replacing Maxime Lopez.
The home team have replaced Giacomo Raspadori with Jeremie Boga. This is the third substitution made today by Roberto De Zerbi.
In the minute 62, Wilfried Stephane Singo is replacing Mergim Vojvoda for Torino at Mapei Stadium.
Torino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Filip Djuricic of Sassuolo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 65, Throw-in high up the field for Torino in Reggio Emilia.
Marco Guida awards the home team a throw-in.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Sasa Lukic (Torino) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Wilfried Stephane Singo of Torino smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Torino.
In the minute 68, Marco Guida signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Jeremie Boga's header is off-target for Sassuolo.
Goal kick for Torino at Mapei Stadium.
In the minute 70, Sassuolo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sassuolo to take a throw-in in Torino territory.
Sassuolo have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 71, Important block from the Torino defence as Filip Djuricic fires in a strike for Sassuolo.
Goal! Filip Djuricic levels the match at 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Mert Muldur.
In the minute 73, Can Torino capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sassuolo's half?
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
Tomas Rincon (Torino) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 74, Torino make their second substitution with Nicolas N`Koulou replacing Simone Verdi.
Roberto De Zerbi (Sassuolo) is making a fourth substitution, with Rogerio replacing Giorgos Kyriakopoulos.
Ball safe as Torino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Torino in the half of Sassuolo.
Andrea Belotti puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 1-2.
Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) has received a yellow card from Marco Guida.
In the minute 79, It's a goal kick for the away team in Reggio Emilia.
Torino take a comfortable 1-3 lead thanks to Sasa Lukic.
Great play from Andrea Belotti to set up the goal.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Torino at Mapei Stadium.
Marco Guida signals a throw-in for Torino, close to Sassuolo's area.
Throw-in for Sassuolo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 83, Play has been interrupted briefly in Reggio Emilia to check on Tomas Rincon, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 84, Marco Guida signals a Torino throw-in in Sassuolo's half.
Sassuolo are back in the match in Reggio Emilia. Vlad Chiriches has scored to make it 2-3.
Filip Djuricic with an assist there.
Torino’s Tomas Rincon is on his feet again at Mapei Stadium.
Goal! Francesco Caputo (Sassuolo) levels the score at 3-3 with a header in Reggio Emilia.
In the minute 85, That's a fine assist from Domenico Berardi.
Marco Giampaolo (Torino) is making a third change, with Jacopo Segre replacing the possibly injured Tomas Rincon.
Sassuolo have a dangerous throw-in.
Francesco Caputo (Sassuolo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sassuolo have a goal kick.
7 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Marco Guida signals a throw-in for Sassuolo, close to Torino's area.
Marco Guida signals a free kick to Torino.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
Marco Guida signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Marco Guida.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
That's full-time at Mapei Stadium. The final score is 3-3.
Marco Giampaolo (Torino) is making a fourth substitution, with Cristian Ansaldi replacing Ricardo Rodriguez.
The home team replace Filip Djuricic with Hamed Junior Traore.
